analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not join the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha with the knowledge of all aspects, nor does he separate them.

original: de ni / 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Because he does not see even the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor ba'am /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor ba'am /
translated: Since he does not see them,🔽how could he join the distinct attributes of a buddha with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: 'byed pa lta ga la yod /🔽sh'a radva ti'i @155a *//
analyzed: 'byed pa lta ga la yod / sh'a radva ti'i @155a *//
translated: or separate them?

original: bu; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
analyzed: bu; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
translated: Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing like that

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: are said to be striving in the perfection of wisdom.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sangs rgyas dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sangs rgyas dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: further, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not join the Buddha with the knowledge of all aspects, nor separate them,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang sangs rgyas su mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang sangs rgyas su mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not unite omniscience with buddhahood, nor does he separate them.

original: de ni / sangs rgyas nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: de ni / sangs rgyas nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: He does not see even buddhahood.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: He does not see even omniscience.

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na /🔽sangs rgyas dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam /🔽thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang sangs rgyas su sbyor ba'am /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na / sangs rgyas dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang sangs rgyas su sbyor ba'am /
translated: Since he does not see them,🔽how could he unite or separate buddhahood and omniscience,

original: 'byed pa lta ga la yod /🔽byang chub dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: 'byed pa lta ga la yod / byang chub dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: or omniscience and buddhahood?🔽He does not unite awakening with omniscience, nor does he separate them.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang byang chub tu mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang byang chub tu mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not unite omniscience with awakening, nor does he separate them.

original: de ni / 'di ltar byang chub nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar byang chub nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Because he does not see even awakening,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: nor does he see even omniscience.

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na /
translated: Since he does not see them,

original: byang chub dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam /🔽thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang byang chub tu sbyor ba'am /
analyzed: byang chub dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang byang chub tu sbyor ba'am /
translated: It is the union of enlightenment and omniscience.🔽🔽

original: 'byed pa lta ga la yod de /
analyzed: 'byed pa lta ga la yod de /
translated: or to the knowledge of all modes, or to enlightenment, or to the knowledge of all modes and enlightenment, or to separate them?

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra: No, Subhūti.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson @155b zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson @155b zhes bya'o //
translated: Subhūti: A bodhisattva great being practicing like that,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra, is said to be practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: Śāriputra: Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not connect with ‘form is existent,’

original: gzugs dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: do not connect with ‘form is nonexistent,’🔽do not connect with ‘feeling is existent,’

original: tshor ba dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshor ba dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: do not connect with ‘feeling is nonexistent,’🔽do not connect with ‘perception is existent,’

original: 'du shes dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du shes dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: do not connect with ‘perception is nonexistent,’

original: 'du byed dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: One does not apply the designation “the entity of compositional activity exists.”

original: 'du byed dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not apply the designation ‘the compounded exists’ or ‘the compounded does not exist.’

original: rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;rnam par shes pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽mig dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;rnam par shes pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // mig dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘consciousness exists’ or ‘consciousness does not exist.’

original: mig dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rna ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // rna ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the eyes exist’ or ‘the eyes do not exist.’

original: rna ba dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽sna dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽sna dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽lce dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rna ba dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // sna dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // sna dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // lce dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the ears exist’ or ‘the ears do not exist.’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘the nose exists’ or ‘the nose does not exist.’

original: lce dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽lus dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // lus dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the tongue exists’ or ‘the tongue does not exist.’

original: lus dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lus dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the body exists’ or ‘the body does not exist.’

original: yid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the mind exists’ or ‘the mind does not exist.’

original: yid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not apply the designation ‘the mind is a thing’ or ‘the mind is not a thing.’

original: gzugs dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽sgra dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // sgra dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘form is a thing’ or ‘form is not a thing.’

original: sgra dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽dri dngos po yod @156a *//🔽ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽dri dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽ro dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sgra dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // dri dngos po yod @156a *// ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // dri dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // ro dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘sound is a thing’ or ‘sound is not a thing.’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘smell is a thing’ or ‘smell is not a thing.’

original: ro dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽reg dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ro dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // reg dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘taste is a thing’ or ‘taste is not a thing.’

original: reg dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽chos dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: reg dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // chos dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘tactile objects are things’ or ‘tactile objects are not things.’

original: chos dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: chos dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘phenomena are things’ or ‘phenomena are not things.’

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the eye consciousness is a thing’ or ‘the eye consciousness is not a thing.’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘the ear consciousness is a thing’ or ‘the ear consciousness is not a thing.’

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘the ear-consciousness is existent. ’

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘the ear-consciousness is nonexistent. ’🔽They do not apply the term ‘the nose-consciousness is existent. ’

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘the nose-consciousness is nonexistent. ’

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘the tongue-consciousness is existent. ’

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘the tongue-consciousness is nonexistent. ’

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;lus kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;lus kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘the body-consciousness is existent. ’ They do not apply the term ‘the body-consciousness is nonexistent. ’

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘the mind-consciousness is existent. ’

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘the mind-consciousness is nonexistent. ’

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘the eye-contact is existent. ’

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces @156b bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces @156b bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of the eyes is something that can be attained.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of the eyes is something that can be abandoned.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of the eyes is something that can be cultivated.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of the eyes is something that can be known.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of the eyes is something that can be made manifest.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of the eyes is something that can be made to cease.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of the eyes is something that can be made to arise.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of the eyes is something that can be purified.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of the eyes is something that can be defiled.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of the eyes is something that can be increased.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of the eyes is something that can be diminished.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the condition of contact through the coming together of the eye exists’ or ‘the condition of contact through the coming together of the eye does not exist.’

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the condition of contact through the coming together of the eye exists’ or ‘the condition of contact through the coming together of the eye does not exist.’

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the condition of contact through the coming together of the ear exists’ or ‘the condition of contact through the coming together of the ear does not exist.’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘the condition of contact through the coming together of the ear exists’ or ‘the condition of contact through the coming together of the ear does not exist.’

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the condition of contact through the coming together of the nose exists’ or ‘the condition of contact through the coming together of the nose does not exist.’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘the condition of contact through the coming together of the nose exists’ or ‘the condition of contact through the coming together of the nose does not exist.’

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the condition of contact through the coming together of the tongue exists’ or ‘the condition of contact through the coming together of the tongue does not exist.’

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med ces bya ba mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med ces bya ba mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the condition of contact through the coming together of the tongue exists’ or ‘the condition of contact through the coming together of the tongue does not exist.’

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of body is a thing.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos @157a *//🔽po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos @157a *// po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of body is not a thing.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of mind is a thing.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of mind is not a thing.

original: sa'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sa'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that the earth element is a thing.

original: sa'i khams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽chu'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sa'i khams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // chu'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that the earth element is not a thing.🔽They do not engage with the idea that the water element is a thing.

original: chu'i khams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: chu'i khams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that the water element is not a thing.

original: me'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: me'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that the fire element is a thing.

original: me'i khams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: me'i khams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that the fire element is not a thing.

original: rlung gi khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rlung gi khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that the wind element is a thing.

original: rlung gi khams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽nam mkha'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rlung gi khams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // nam mkha'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not apply the designation ‘the space element is not a thing’ to the space element,🔽they do not apply the designation ‘the space element is a thing’ to the space element,

original: nam mkha'i khams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //

analyzed: sred pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //

analyzed: len pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // srid pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //

analyzed: srid pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //

analyzed: skye ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //

analyzed: rga shi dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘existent thing’ to old age and death,

original: rga shi dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rga shi dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘existent thing’ to the perfection of giving,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not apply the designation ‘non-existent thing’ to the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘existent thing’ to the perfection of morality,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not apply the designation ‘non-existent thing’ to the perfection of morality.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘existent thing’ to the perfection of patience,🔽and they do not apply the designation ‘non-existent thing’ to the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘existent thing’ to the perfection of perseverance,🔽and they do not apply the designation ‘non-existent thing’ to the perfection of perseverance.

original: brtson @158a *// 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: brtson @158a *// 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they should not apply the designation ‘the transcendent perfection of perseverance is non-existent.’

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They should not apply the designation ‘the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is existent.’

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They should not apply the designation ‘the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is non-existent.’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They should not apply the designation ‘the transcendent perfection of wisdom is existent.’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They should not apply the designation ‘the transcendent perfection of wisdom is non-existent.’

original: nang stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽nang stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // nang stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They should not apply the designation ‘inner emptiness is existent.’🔽They should not apply the designation ‘inner emptiness is non-existent.’

original: phyi stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽phyi stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // phyi stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They should not apply the designation ‘outer emptiness is existent.’🔽They should not apply the designation ‘outer emptiness is non-existent.’

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They should not apply the designation ‘inner and outer emptiness is existent.’

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the statement, “The emptiness of the external and the internal is a non-thing.”

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the statement, “The emptiness of emptiness is a thing.”

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the statement, “The emptiness of emptiness is a non-thing.”

original: chen po stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the statement, “The emptiness of great extent is a thing.”

original: chen po stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the statement, “The emptiness of great extent is a non-thing.”

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the statement, “The emptiness of ultimate reality is a thing.”

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the statement, “The emptiness of ultimate reality is a non-thing.”

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the statement, “The emptiness of conditioned phenomena is a thing.”🔽He does not join with the statement, “The emptiness of conditioned phenomena is a non-thing.”

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the statement, “The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is a thing.”

original: @158b 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: @158b 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join the emptiness of the unconditioned to anything.🔽He does not join the emptiness of the beyond to existence.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join the emptiness of the beyond to nonexistence.🔽He does not join the emptiness of what is not to be discarded to existence.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // rang bzhin stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join the emptiness of what is not to be discarded to nonexistence.🔽He does not join the emptiness of nature to existence.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join the emptiness of nature to nonexistence.🔽He does not join the emptiness of all things to existence.🔽He does not join the emptiness of all things to nonexistence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is not to be conjoined with the term ‘existent thing. ’

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is not to be conjoined with the term ‘nonexistent thing. ’

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics is not to be conjoined with the term ‘existent thing. ’🔽The emptiness of defining characteristics is not to be conjoined with the term ‘nonexistent thing. ’

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is not to be conjoined with the term ‘existent thing. ’

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is not to be conjoined with the term ‘nonexistent thing. ’

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: The emptiness of non-things is not to be conjoined with the term ‘existent thing. ’

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: The emptiness of non-things is not to be conjoined with the term ‘nonexistent thing. ’

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is not to be conjoined with the term ‘existent thing. ’

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is not to be conjoined with the term ‘nonexistent thing. ’

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid @159a *//
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid @159a *//
translated: emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature

original: dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: does not apply to “an existent thing.”🔽emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: does not apply to “a nonexistent thing.”

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: The applications of mindfulness do not apply to “an existent thing.”

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // yang dag par spong ba rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: The applications of mindfulness do not apply to “a nonexistent thing.”🔽The right efforts do not apply to “an existent thing.”

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: The right efforts do not apply to “a nonexistent thing.”🔽The legs of supernormal power do not apply to “an existent thing.”

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽dbang po rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // dbang po rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: The legs of supernormal power do not apply to “a nonexistent thing.”🔽The faculties do not apply to “an existent thing.”

original: dbang po rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dbang po rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: The faculties do not apply to “a nonexistent thing.”

original: stobs rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: stobs rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the powers as having substance,

original: stobs rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: stobs rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not engage with the powers as not having substance.🔽They do not engage with the branches of awakening as having substance,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽lam rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // lam rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not engage with the branches of awakening as not having substance.🔽They do not engage with the paths as having substance,

original: lam rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lam rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not engage with the paths as not having substance.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the noble truths as having substance,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽bsam gtan rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // bsam gtan rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not engage with the noble truths as not having substance.🔽They do not engage with the meditative stabilities as having substance,

original: bsam gtan rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽tshad med pa rnams @159b dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // tshad med pa rnams @159b dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not engage with the meditative stabilities as not having substance.🔽They do not engage with the immeasurable aspirations as having substance,

original: tshad med pa rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not engage with the immeasurable aspirations as not having substance.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the formless absorptions as things that exist.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the formless absorptions as things that do not exist.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the eight aspects of liberation as things that exist.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the eight aspects of liberation as things that do not exist.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the nine serial steps of meditative absorption as things that exist.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the nine serial steps of meditative absorption as things that do not exist.🔽They do not engage with emptiness as a thing that exists.

original: stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽mtshan ma med pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // mtshan ma med pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with emptiness as a thing that does not exist.🔽They do not engage with signlessness as a thing that exists.

analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar @160b mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // dgra bcom pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar @160b mi sbyor ro //

original: dgra bcom pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rang byang chub dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // rang byang chub dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the statement ‘the state of a worthy one is not a thing’;🔽they do not engage with the statement ‘a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is a thing’;

original: rang byang chub dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rang byang chub dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the statement ‘a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is not a thing’;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the statement ‘the understanding of all aspects is a thing’;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the understanding of the aspects of the path to anything, saying that it is a thing.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the knowledge of all aspects to anything, saying that it is a thing.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro ////
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro ////
translated: He does not join with the knowledge of all aspects to anything, saying that it is not a thing.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po brgyad pa /
analyzed: bam po brgyad pa /
translated: Eighth fascicle

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: Moreover, Śāriputra, when bodhisattva-mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not join with the idea that form is permanent.

original: gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽tshor ba rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // tshor ba rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not join with the idea that form is impermanent.🔽They do not join with the idea that feeling is permanent.

original: tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽'du shes rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // 'du shes rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not join with the idea that feeling is impermanent.🔽They do not join with the idea that perception is permanent.

original: 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not join with the idea that perception is impermanent.

original: 'du byed rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that volitional factors are permanent, nor do they engage with the notion that they are impermanent.

original: rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽mig rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // mig rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that consciousness is permanent, nor do they engage with the notion that it is impermanent.

original: mig mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rna ba rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // rna ba rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the eyes are permanent, nor do they engage with the notion that they are impermanent.

original: rna ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽sna rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rna ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // sna rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the ears are permanent, nor do they engage with the notion that they are impermanent.

original: sna mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽lce rtag ces bya bar @161a *//🔽mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sna mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // lce rtag ces bya bar @161a *// mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the nose is permanent, nor do they engage with the notion that it is impermanent.

original: lce mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽lus rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // lus rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the tongue is permanent, nor do they engage with the notion that it is impermanent.

original: lus mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽yid rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lus mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // yid rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the body is permanent, nor do they engage with the notion that it is impermanent.

original: yid mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the mind is permanent, nor do they engage with the notion that it is impermanent.

original: gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that forms are permanent, nor do they engage with the notion that they are impermanent.

original: gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽sgra rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // sgra rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that form is impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the idea that sound is permanent.

original: sgra mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽dri rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sgra mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // dri rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that sound is impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the idea that smell is permanent.

original: dri mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽ro rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dri mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // ro rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that smell is impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the idea that taste is permanent.

original: ro mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽reg rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ro mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // reg rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that taste is impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the idea that tactile objects are permanent.

original: reg mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽chos rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: reg mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // chos rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that tactile objects are impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the idea that mental phenomena are permanent.

original: chos mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: chos mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // mig gi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that mental phenomena are impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the idea that the eye consciousness is permanent.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that the eye consciousness is impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the idea that the ear consciousness is permanent.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that the ear consciousness is impermanent.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that the nose consciousness is permanent.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽lce'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // lce'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the thought that the nose consciousness is impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the thought that the tongue consciousness is permanent.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽lus kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // lus kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the thought that the tongue consciousness is impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the thought that the body consciousness is permanent.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the thought that the body consciousness is impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the thought that the mind consciousness is permanent.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya @161b bar mi sbyor ro //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya @161b bar mi sbyor ro // mig gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the thought that the mind consciousness is impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the thought that the sensory element of the eyes is permanent.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the thought that the sensory element of the eyes is impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the thought that the sensory element of the ears is permanent.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the thought that the sensory element of the ears is impermanent.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the thought that the sensory element of the nose is permanent.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // lce'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They should not train by joining with the notion that the composite of nose contact is imbued with happiness.🔽They should not train by joining with the notion that the composite of tongue contact is imbued with suffering.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They should not train by joining with the notion that the composite of tongue contact is imbued with happiness.🔽They should not train by joining with the notion that the composite of body contact is imbued with suffering.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They should not train by joining with the notion that the composite of body contact is imbued with happiness.🔽They should not train by joining with the notion that the composite of mind contact is imbued with suffering.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They should not train by joining with the notion that the composite of mind contact is imbued with happiness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They should not train by joining with the notion that the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is imbued with suffering.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They should not train by joining with the notion that the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is imbued with happiness.🔽They should not train by joining with the notion that the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact is imbued with suffering.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They should not train by joining with the notion that the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact is imbued with happiness.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that feelings conditioned by sensory contact that is mentally compounded are permanent.🔽They do not engage with the idea that feelings conditioned by sensory contact that is mentally compounded are impermanent.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that the earth element is permanent.🔽They do not engage with the idea that the earth element is impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the idea that the water element is permanent.🔽They do not engage with the idea that the water element is impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the idea that the fire element is permanent.🔽They do not engage with the idea that the fire element is impermanent.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that the wind element is permanent.🔽They do not engage with the idea that the wind element is impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the idea that the space element is permanent.

translated: They do not apply the term ‘permanent’ to emptiness that is not something to be guarded against.🔽They do not apply the term ‘impermanent’ to emptiness that is not something to be guarded against.

translated: They do not apply the term ‘permanent’ to emptiness that is not something to be guarded against.🔽They do not apply the term ‘impermanent’ to emptiness that is not something to be guarded against.🔽They do not apply the term ‘permanent’ to emptiness that is not something to be guarded against.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //

analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // rnam par thar pa brgyad rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the formless absorptions as impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the eight deliverances as permanent.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the eight deliverances as impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the nine serial absorptions as permanent.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the nine serial absorptions as impermanent.

original: stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with ‘emptiness is permanent,’

original: stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽mtshan ma med pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // mtshan ma med pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not engage with ‘emptiness is impermanent.’🔽They do not engage with ‘signlessness is permanent,’

original: mtshan med pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽smon pa med pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mtshan med pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // smon pa med pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not engage with ‘signlessness is impermanent.’🔽They do not engage with ‘wishlessness is permanent,’

original: smon @164b pa med pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: smon @164b pa med pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not engage with ‘wishlessness is impermanent.’🔽They do not engage with ‘the clairvoyances are permanent,’

original: mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not engage with ‘the clairvoyances are impermanent.’🔽They do not engage with ‘the meditative stabilizations are permanent,’

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not engage with ‘the meditative stabilizations are impermanent.’🔽They do not engage with ‘the dhāraṇī gateways are permanent,’

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not engage with ‘the dhāraṇī gateways are impermanent.’

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with ‘the ten powers of the tathāgatas are permanent,’

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽mi 'jigs pa bzhi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // mi 'jigs pa bzhi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the ten powers of the tathāgatas are permanent.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the four assurances are permanent.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the four assurances are impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the four kinds of exact knowledge are permanent.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the four kinds of exact knowledge are impermanent.

original: byams pa chen po rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽byams pa chen po mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: byams pa chen po rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // byams pa chen po mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that great loving kindness is permanent.🔽They do not engage with the notion that great loving kindness is impermanent.

original: snying rje chen po rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: snying rje chen po rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that great compassion is permanent.

original: snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that great compassion is impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are permanent.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are impermanent.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the statement, ‘The fruit of entering the stream is permanent’;🔽they do not engage with the statement, ‘The fruit of entering the stream is impermanent’;

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras @165a *//
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras @165a *//
translated: they do not engage with the statement, ‘The fruit of being tied to one more rebirth is permanent’;

original: bu mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: bu mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the statement, ‘The fruit of being tied to one more rebirth is impermanent’;🔽they do not engage with the statement, ‘The fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth is permanent’;

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // dgra bcom pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the statement, ‘The fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth is impermanent’;🔽they do not engage with the statement, ‘Arhatship is permanent’;

original: dgra bcom pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rang byang chub rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // rang byang chub rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the statement, ‘Arhatship is impermanent’;🔽they do not engage with the statement, ‘A pratyekabuddha’s awakening is permanent’;

original: rang byang chub mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rang byang chub mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the statement, ‘A pratyekabuddha’s awakening is impermanent’;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the statement, ‘The knowledge of path aspects is permanent’;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the knowledge of path aspects as impermanent.🔽He does not join with the knowledge of all aspects as permanent.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the knowledge of all aspects as impermanent.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra!

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In that way,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva is said to be ‘diligent in the perfection of wisdom.’

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: Moreover, Śāriputra, when bodhisattva mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not join with ‘form is happiness.’ They do not join with ‘form is suffering.’

original: tshor ba bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshor ba bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not join with ‘feeling is happiness.’

original: tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not join with ‘feeling is suffering.’

original: 'du shes bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du shes bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not join with ‘perception is happiness.’

original: 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the notion that perception is suffering.

original: 'du byed bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the notion that volitional factors are happiness.

original: 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the notion that volitional factors are suffering.

original: rnam par shes pa bde'o zhes bya bar @165b mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bde'o zhes bya bar @165b mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the notion that consciousness is happiness.

original: rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the notion that consciousness is suffering.

original: mig bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the notion that the eyes are happiness.

original: mig sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: rna ba bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;rna ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rna ba bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;rna ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the notion that the ears are happiness. He does not apply the notion that the ears are suffering.

original: sna bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sna bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the notion that the nose is happiness.

original: sna sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sna sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the notion that the nose is suffering.

original: lce bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the notion that the tongue is happiness.

original: lce sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the notion that the tongue is suffering.

original: lus bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lus bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the notion that the body is happiness.

original: lus sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lus sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: yid bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

analyzed: gzugs bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

analyzed: sgra bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

analyzed: ro bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

analyzed: ro sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not apply the designation ‘unhappy’ to taste.🔽They do not apply the designation ‘happy’ to feeling,

original: reg bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;reg sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: reg bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;reg sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

analyzed: chos bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: chos sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: chos sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not apply the designation ‘unhappy’ to dharmas.

analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;mig gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

translated: He does not apply the notion that gustatory contact is suffering.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the thought, ‘The feeling that arises due to the condition of my contact with the nose is painful.’

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the term ‘suffering’ to the feeling that arises from the condition of the tongue’s contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the term ‘happiness’ to the feeling that arises from the condition of the mind’s contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: sa'i khams bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sa'i khams bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the term ‘happiness’ to the earth element.

original: sa'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sa'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the term ‘suffering’ to the earth element.

original: chu'i khams bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: chu'i khams bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: chu'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: chu'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: me'i khams bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: me'i khams bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: me'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: me'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: rlung gi khams bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rlung gi khams bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

analyzed: ro; ;nam mkha'i khams bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: nam mkha'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

analyzed: ma rig pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;'du byed bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply volitional factors to the idea of suffering.

original: rnam par shes pa bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply consciousness to the idea of happiness.

original: rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply consciousness to the idea of suffering.

original: ming dang gzugs bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: ming dang gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

analyzed: reg pa bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the term ‘happy’ to contact.

original: reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the term ‘unhappy’ to contact.🔽He does not apply the term ‘happy’ to feeling.

original: tshor ba bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshor ba bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the term ‘unhappy’ to feeling.

original: sred pa bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sred pa bde'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
