original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the emptiness of own-nature as “not peaceful.”

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the emptiness of the own-nature of nonthings as “peaceful.”

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the emptiness of the own-nature of nonthings as “not peaceful.”

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the applications of mindfulness are calm,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not engage with the notion that the applications of mindfulness are not calm.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the right efforts are calm,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not engage with the notion that the right efforts are not calm.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the legs of meditative stability are calm,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not engage with the notion that the legs of meditative stability are not calm.

original: dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽dbang po rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // dbang po rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the faculties are calm,🔽and they do not engage with the notion that the faculties are not calm.

original: stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the powers are calm,

original: stobs rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: stobs rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not engage with the notion that the powers are not calm.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the branches of enlightenment are calm,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not engage with the notion that the branches of enlightenment are not calm.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘peaceful’ to the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘not peaceful’ to the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘peaceful’ to the four noble truths.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽bsam gtan rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // bsam gtan rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘not peaceful’ to the four noble truths.🔽They do not apply the term ‘peaceful’ to the meditative concentrations.

original: bsam gtan rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar @178b mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar @178b mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘not peaceful’ to the meditative concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘peaceful’ to the immeasurable aspirations.

original: tshad med pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘not peaceful’ to the immeasurable aspirations.🔽They do not apply the term ‘peaceful’ to the formless absorptions.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘not peaceful’ to the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘peaceful’ to the eight aspects of liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: nor do they apply the designation not peaceful to them.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation peaceful to the nine serial steps of meditative absorption,🔽nor do they apply the designation not peaceful to them.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation peaceful to the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors of liberation,🔽nor do they apply the designation not peaceful to them.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation peaceful to the clairvoyances,🔽nor do they apply the designation not peaceful to them.🔽They do not apply the designation peaceful to the meditative stabilities,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: nor do they apply the designation not peaceful to them.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the dhāraṇī gateways in terms of peace.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the dhāraṇī gateways in terms of not peace. They do not engage with the ten powers of the tathāgatas in terms of peace.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhi zhes bya bar @179a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhi zhes bya bar @179a *//
translated: They do not engage with the ten powers of the tathāgatas in terms of not peace.

original: mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the four fearlessnesses in terms of peace.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the four fearlessnesses in terms of not peace.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the four detailed and thorough knowledges in terms of peace.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽byams pa chen po zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // byams pa chen po zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the four detailed and thorough knowledges in terms of not peace.🔽They do not engage with great love in terms of peace.

original: byams pa chen po ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: byams pa chen po ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with great love in terms of not peace.🔽They do not engage with great compassion in terms of peace.

original: snying rje chen po ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: snying rje chen po ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with great compassion in terms of not peace.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are calm.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are not calm.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the fruit of entering the stream is calm.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the fruit of entering the stream is not calm.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth is calm.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth is not calm.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth is calm.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // dgra bcom pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth is not calm.🔽They do not engage with the notion that arhatship is calm.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that arhatship is not calm.

original: rang byang chub zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rang byang chub zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that individual enlightenment is calm.

original: rang byang chub ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rang byang chub ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with ‘the pratyekabuddha’s awakening’ as calm,🔽they do not engage with ‘the knowledge of path aspects’ as calm,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with ‘the knowledge of path aspects’ as not calm,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa @179b nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa @179b nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with ‘the knowledge of all aspects’ as calm,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with ‘the knowledge of all aspects’ as not calm.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
translated: bodhisattva great beings practicing like that

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: are said to be endeavoring at the perfection of wisdom.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: further, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not engage with ‘form’ as empty or not empty,

original: tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: do not engage with ‘feeling’ as empty or not empty,

original: 'du shes stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;'du byed stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du shes stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;'du byed stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘empty’ or ‘not empty’ to form.

original: rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘empty’ or ‘not empty’ to feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: mig stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘empty’ or ‘not empty’ to the eyes.

original: rna pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rna pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘empty’ or ‘not empty’ to the ears, nose, tongue, body, or mind.

original: sna stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽lce stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;lus stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sna stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // lce stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;lus stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘empty’ or ‘not empty’ to a form.🔽They do not apply the designation ‘empty’ or ‘not empty’ to a sound, a smell, a taste, a feeling, or a dharma.

original: yid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘empty’ or ‘not empty’ to the eye consciousness, ear consciousness, nose consciousness, tongue consciousness, body consciousness, or thinking-mind consciousness.

original: gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;sgra stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;sgra stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that sound is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: dri stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dri stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that smell is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: ro stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ro stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that taste is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: reg @180a *// stong zhes bya bar ma mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: reg @180a *// stong zhes bya bar ma mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that tactility is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: chos stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: chos stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that mental phenomena are empty, or that they are not empty.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that visual consciousness is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that auditory consciousness is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that olfactory consciousness is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the thought that the tongue consciousness is empty or not empty.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the thought that the body consciousness is empty or not empty.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the thought that the mind consciousness is empty or not empty.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the thought that visual contact is empty or not empty.🔽They do not engage with the thought that auditory contact is empty or not empty.🔽They do not engage with the thought that olfactory contact is empty or not empty.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the thought that gustatory contact is empty or not empty.🔽They do not engage with the thought that tactile contact is empty or not empty.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that mental contact is empty or that it is not empty.🔽

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of the eyes is empty, or that it is not empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of sights is empty, or that it is not empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of visual consciousness is empty, or that it is not empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of the ears is empty, or that it is not empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of sounds is empty, or that it is not empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of auditory consciousness is empty, or that it is not empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of the nose is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor @180b ro; ;sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor @180b ro; ;sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of smells is empty, or that it is not empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of olfactory consciousness is empty, or that it is not empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of the tongue is empty, or that it is not empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of tastes is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of gustatory consciousness is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of the body is empty, or that it is not empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of tactile objects is empty, or that it is not empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of tactile consciousness is empty, or that it is not empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of the mental faculty is empty, or that it is not empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of mental objects is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the sensory element of mental consciousness is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: sa'i khams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sa'i khams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that the earth element is empty or that it is not empty.

original: chu'i khams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: chu'i khams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that the water element is empty or that it is not empty.

original: me'i khams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: me'i khams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that the fire element is empty or that it is not empty.

original: rlung gi khams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rlung gi khams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that the wind element is empty or that it is not empty.

original: nam mkha'i khams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that the space element is empty or that it is not empty.🔽He does not engage with the notion that the consciousness element is empty or that it is not empty.

original: ma rig pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ma rig pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that fundamental ignorance is empty or that it is not empty.

original: 'du byed stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that formative predispositions are empty or that they are not empty.

original: rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that consciousness is empty or that it is not empty.

original: ming dang gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that name and form are empty, or that they are not empty.

original: skye mched drug stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: skye mched drug stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that the six sense fields are empty, or that they are not empty.

original: reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that contact is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽sred pa stong @181a *//
analyzed: tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // sred pa stong @181a *//
translated: He does not engage with the notion that sensation is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: zhes bya ba'am mi sbyor zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'am mi sbyor zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that craving is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: len pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: len pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that grasping is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: srid pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: srid pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that becoming is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: skye ba stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: skye ba stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that birth is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: rga shi stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rga shi stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that aging and death are empty, or that they are not empty.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of generosity is empty, or that it is not empty. They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of tolerance is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of perseverance is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of wisdom is empty, or that it is not empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that inner emptiness is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that outer emptiness is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of external and internal phenomena as empty or not empty.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of emptiness as empty or not empty.

original: chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of great extent as empty or not empty.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of ultimate reality as empty or not empty.

original: 'dus byas stong pa @181b nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa @181b nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of conditioned phenomena as empty or not empty.🔽He does not engage with the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena as empty or not empty.🔽He does not engage with the emptiness of the unlimited as empty or not empty.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end as empty or not empty.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya par mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya par mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of non-rejection as empty or not empty.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of inherent existence as empty or not empty.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of all phenomena as empty or not empty.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of specific characteristics as empty or not empty.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of non-apprehension as empty or not empty.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of non-things as empty or not empty.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of essential nature as empty or not empty.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things as empty or not empty.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the applications of mindfulness are empty, or that they are not empty.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the right efforts are empty, or that they are not empty.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the legs of miraculous power are empty, or that they are not empty.

original: dbang po rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor @182a *//
analyzed: dbang po rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor @182a *//
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the faculties are empty, or that they are not empty.

original: ro; ;stobs rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ro; ;stobs rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the powers are empty, or that they are not empty.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the branches of enlightenment are empty, or that they are not empty. They do not engage with the notion that the noble eightfold path is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the noble truths are empty, or that they are not empty.

original: bsam gtan rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the meditative concentrations are empty or that they are not empty.

original: tshad med pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the immeasurable aspirations are empty or that they are not empty.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the formless absorptions are empty or that they are not empty.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the eight aspects of liberation are empty or that they are not empty.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the nine serial steps of meditative absorption are empty or that they are not empty.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors of liberation are empty or that they are not empty.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the superknowledges are empty or that they are not empty.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the meditative stabilities as empty or not empty.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the dhāraṇī gateways as empty or not empty.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the ten powers of the tathāgatas as empty or not empty.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams @182b stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams @182b stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the fearlessnesses as empty or not empty.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽byams pa chen po stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // byams pa chen po stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges as empty or not empty.🔽They do not engage with great love as empty or not empty.

original: snying rje chen po stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: snying rje chen po stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with great compassion as empty or not empty.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the distinct attributes of the buddhas as empty or not empty.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the knowledge of all aspects as empty or not empty.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the knowledge of the aspects of the path as empty or not empty.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the knowledge of all aspects as empty or not empty.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
translated: great bodhisattva beings who practice accordingly

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o ////
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o ////
translated: are said to be diligent in practicing the transcendent perfection of wisdom.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po dgu pa /
analyzed: bam po dgu pa /
translated: The Ninth Book

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom, they do not engage with the notion that physical forms are with signs or that they are signless.

original: tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that feelings are with signs or that they are signless.

original: 'du shes mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du shes mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that perceptions are with signs or that they are signless.

original: 'du byed mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor @183a *//
analyzed: 'du byed mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor @183a *//
translated: They do not engage with the notion that formative predispositions are with signs or that they are signless.

original: ro; ;rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ro; ;rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that consciousness is with signs or that it is signless.

original: mig mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rna ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽sna mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // rna ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // sna mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the eyes are with signs or that they are signless.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the ears are with signs or that they are signless.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the nose is with signs or that it is signless.

original: lce mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the tongue is with signs or that it is signless.

original: lus mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lus mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the body is with signs or that it is signless.

original: yid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the mind as having signs or signless.

original: gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with form as having signs or signless.

original: sgra mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽dri mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽ro mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sgra mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // dri mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // ro mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with sound as having signs or signless.🔽He does not engage with smell as having signs or signless.🔽He does not engage with taste as having signs or signless.

original: reg mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: reg mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with touch as having signs or signless.

original: chos mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: chos mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with mental phenomena as having signs or signless.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the eye consciousness as having signs or signless. He does not engage with the ear consciousness as having signs or signless.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi @183b sbyor ro; ;lce'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi @183b sbyor ro; ;lce'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘with signs’ or ‘signless’ to the tongue consciousness.🔽They do not apply the designation ‘with signs’ or ‘signless’ to the body consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘with signs’ or ‘signless’ to the thinking consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘with signs’ or ‘signless’ to eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘with signs’ or ‘signless’ to ear contact.
